attributes.action: increase the minimum sentence for possesion of firearms and weapons in the U.K
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To increase the existing awareness of gun crime in the U.K particularly amongst the younger generation. 'Drop Dem Guns' is a petition from Londoner's looking to find as many supporters whom believe that the sentence for possesion of firearms in the U.K needs to be raised.
